title: Fashions in wool for '61
creator_credit: Frank Land and Australian Wool Corporation
brief_description: Depicts some of the winners in the Australian Wool Bureau’s Wool Fashion Awards for 1961. The fashions are modelled in various locations around Sydney. Commentary by Leonard Teale; photography by George Heath. The model is Pat Woodley.
